column5: I was asked by karl to submit an article to him regarding winter steelhead so I did. Turns out that he liked the article so he printed it in this magazine coming out. Please take a look and let me know what you think. This is the first article that I have wrote and I was wondering what averbody thinks. Thanks in Advance.  Todd

Cool Todd!!  I'll definitely take a look since I took a liking to this winter steelheading thing.  Any tips I can get will be very helpful!  After seeing your last few reports, I'm sure you'll have lots of great stuff in there!  Thanks.
Looking forward to reading it   Thanks again for all of the help last week!  Bly
not a problem bly by the looks of it you have broken it in...is it all you thought it would be?
I would say yes    Definitely would recommend it to anyone new to steel/trout fishing and looking to get a decent rod without spending alot.  bly
Todd, Just finished reading the article.....nicely done!  Easy to read and helpful information.  Thank you for giving the heads up about that missing pragragh and for posting it.  bly
I too read the article and found it very well written and understandable even with the paragraph being taken out [although I had to read that too]... lots of good info in there...  Bill
Where are you guys finding the magazine?  I have looked at the news stands with no luck.
Is there a URL that someone could share?  I haven't heard of Extreme Angler magazine...  Thanks, Tony
